projects.title: Travel Agent
projects.subtitle: Full-Stack Development
projects.shortDescription: An intelligent travel planning application combining real-time flight data, hotel information, and weather forecasts with AI-powered recommendations.
projects.fullDescription: Travel Agent is a comprehensive travel planning application that leverages multiple APIs and AI technology to help users plan their perfect trip. The application features an interactive trip planning form with location swap functionality, budget planning capabilities, and real-time data from Amadeus (flights/hotels) and OpenWeather APIs. Powered by OpenAI for personalized recommendations, the app uses Promise.all for parallel data fetching, IndexedDB caching for airport codes and city coordinates, and session storage for efficient handling of large trip plans. Built with React 19 and React Router 7, it implements lazy-loaded routes and follows a mobile-first responsive design approach.
highlights: Real-time flight, hotel, and weather data integration
Parallel API data fetching for optimal performance
Mobile-first responsive design with lazy-loaded routes

projects.title: Vanlife
projects.subtitle: Front-End Development
projects.shortDescription: A React-based marketplace for van rentals featuring secure authentication, host management dashboard, and mobile-optimized responsive design.
projects.fullDescription: Vanlife is a comprehensive single-page application marketplace for van rentals built as a learning project for React Router concepts. The application enables users to browse a catalog of vans with detailed listings and provides a secure authentication system for host access. The host dashboard includes income tracking, review monitoring, and rental management capabilities. Built with React 18.2.0 and React Router v6.4.3, the project demonstrates advanced concepts including loader-based data fetching, protected routes with authentication guards, and nested routing structures for complex layouts. Firebase Firestore handles data storage while MirageJS provides mock authentication. The application follows a modular CSS architecture and features a mobile-optimized responsive interface built with React Icons for UI elements.
highlights: Loader-based data fetching with React Router
Nested routing structures for complex layouts
Host dashboard with income tracking and reviews
Firebase Firestore integration for data persistence
